message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $1500000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $1100000. I'm willing to compromise and sell the product to you for $1150000. This is still a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $1500000. What do you think?
I'm still very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1050000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I understand you're still interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1125000. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to you is $1500000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1075000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I'm still willing to work with you, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $1125000. I'm willing to make one more concession to meet you in the middle. I'll sell the product to you for $1100000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1075000. I'm willing to make a deal at this price. Is this acceptable to you?

I'm not willing to accept $1075000, Bob. I think we're getting close, but I need to get a bit closer to my target. I'll sell the product to you for $1080000. This is my final offer. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll make the deal. Otherwise, I'll have to consider other options.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still not willing to go above $1075000. I'm willing to make a deal at this price. Is this acceptable to you?
